<script>
let currentLang = 'en';

function switchLanguage(lang) {
  currentLang = lang;
  document.querySelectorAll('[data-lang]').forEach(el => {
    if (el.getAttribute('data-lang') === lang) {
      el.style.display = '';
    } else {
      el.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  document.getElementById('lang-en').classList.toggle('active', lang === 'en');
  document.getElementById('lang-es').classList.toggle('active', lang === 'es');
  
  // Also handle book sections
  document.querySelectorAll('.about-book-section').forEach(el => {
    if (el.getAttribute('data-lang') === lang) {
      el.style.display = '';
    } else {
      el.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  switchLanguage('en');
  
  // Move book section to left sidebar (after links)
  const bookSection = document.querySelector('.about-book-section');
  const aboutLinks = document.querySelector('.about-links');
  
  if (bookSection && aboutLinks) {
    aboutLinks.parentNode.insertBefore(bookSection, aboutLinks.nextSibling);
  }
});
</script>
